title: Sport and Media (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht,
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (alteration name department title minister) order

title: Sport and Media (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: (2) This Order comes into operation on 2 June 2025.
text_raw:
2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 June 2025.

title: Sport and Media (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, An Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt 
agus Meán and, in the English language, the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an 
Roinn Cultúir, Cumarsáide agus Spóirt and, in the English language, to that of 
the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean english language department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium altered irish language roinn cultuir cumarsaide agus spoirt english language department culture communication sport

title: Sport and Media (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, 
Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán and, in the English language, the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an tAire Cultúir, Cumarsáide agus Spóirt and, in the English 
language, to that of the Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean english language minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium altered irish language taire cultuir cumarsaide agus spoirt english language minister culture communication sport

title: Sport and Media (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

references to the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media shall be construed as references to the 
Department of Culture, Communications and Sport, 

and 

(b) 

references to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media shall be construed as references to the Minister 
for Culture, Communications and Sport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [236] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [236]
